backgammon.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • backgammon.game.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Class Game. Contains the game loop and creates a new board, players etc This class just needs two Individuals passed in to it to play a game, if null the player will pick random moves To get a human player, in the backgammon.settings package change the gameSettings class, areBothAIs = false
    Author:
    David Lomas - 11035527
